span.span: Represents the method that will handle the event of a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 双击属性窗口中的图标将引发事件，与关联的图标。Double-clicking an icon in the Properties window will raise the event of the that the icon is associated with. 事件通常启动一个用户界面 (UI) 来编辑该属性的值。The event typically launches a user interface (UI) to edit the property's value. 添加到属性分配事件处理程序双击显示在属性名称旁边的图标时执行的适当行为。Add a to the property of a to assign an event handler to perform the appropriate behavior when the icon displayed next to the property name is double-clicked. 创建 委托时，需要标识将处理该事件的方法。When you create a delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event. 若要将事件与事件处理程序关联，请将该委托的一个实例添加到事件中。To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event. 除非移除了该委托，否则每当发生该事件时就会调用事件处理程序。The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate. 有关事件处理程序委托的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about event-handler delegates, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例提供名为任何的组件属性的对象`HorizontalMargin`或`VerticalMargin`。The following code example provides a object for any properties of the component named `HorizontalMargin` or `VerticalMargin`. 映像、 工具提示和的事件处理程序显示一个消息框，单击该属性的映像时，提供了这些属性。The for these properties provides an image, a ToolTip, and an event handler that displays a message box when the image for the property is clicked. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供接口。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the interface. [!code-cpp[IPropertyValueUIServiceExample#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/IPropertyValueUIServiceExample/CPP/propertyuicomponent.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[IPropertyValueUIServiceExample#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/IPropertyValueUIServiceExample/CS/propertyuicomponent.cs#2)] [!code-vb[IPropertyValueUIServiceExample#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/IPropertyValueUIServiceExample/VB/propertyuicomponent.vb#2)]
